doc.title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
doc.author: Julie Dillon
doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Honeycomb by Julie Dillon

main.p: Julie Dillon is a science fiction and fantasy illustrator creating art for books and magazines, as well as for her own projects and publications. She has won multiple Chesley awards, two Hugo Awards, and has been nominated for the World Fantasy Award.
